turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order a venti caramel macchiato from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 5th Avenue, Demond, Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your drink to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
